_source.text: 4.5 stars - Very Good - "...Ruth Brown's latest captures her spirit of sincerity better than any of her recordings since a long-ago meeting with Thad Jones and Mel Lewis...even the spaces Brown leaves between phrases are supercharged with meaning...."

text: 4.5 stars - Very **Good** - "...Ruth Brown's latest captures her spirit of sincerity **better** **than** any of
her recordings since a long-ago meeting with Thad Jones and Mel **Lewis**...even the spaces Brown
leaves between phrases are supercharged with **meaning**...."

_source.text: A a proud South Cantabrian, Derek also liked nothing better than a good debate on just about any subject.

text: A a **proud** **South** Cantabrian, Derek also liked nothing **better** **than** a **good** debate on just about any subject.
